name: HipChat
description: Commands for HipChat, an online group and private chat service for teams

Room Actions.val: Enter an existing HipChat room (HipChat web app only)
Leave the room you're currently in
Change the topic of the room you're currently in

Setting Your Status.val: Set your status as available (green) and optionally includes a message
Set your status as away (yellow) and optionally includes a message
Set your status as Do Not Disturb (red) and optionally includes a message

Formatting Messages.val: Display the message with code syntax highlighting
Use special message formatting when you quote someone
Clear chat history in the current room or 1-1 chat. (History comes back when you reopen the room or chat)
Chat about yourself in the third person
Fix your typos. Use regular expression syntax
Show hexadecimal web colors within HipChat
